macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Trades at $88,644 with Mixed Market Performance
items.summary: As of 09:30 AM UTC on December 21, 2025, Bitcoin is trading at $88,644, up 0.35%, while most major cryptocurrencies show mixed performance.

items.title: $85K Emerges as Critical Support Level for Bitcoin Amid Weak Demand
items.summary: Bitcoin faces risks at the $85K level due to weak U.S. demand, $300 million net outflows from BTC ETFs in December, and ongoing profit-taking by long-term holders.

items.title: Bitcoin Munari Confirms Token Launch on December 28 After Early Milestones
items.summary: Bitcoin Munari, a Solana-based project transitioning to its own Layer-1 blockchain in 2027, advances its public token launch to December 28 following completed presale and audits.

items.title: Over 44,885 New Cryptocurrencies Created in Last 24 Hours as Total Hits 28.62 Million
items.summary: CoinMarketCap reports 44,885 new cryptocurrencies launched in the 24 hours before December 20, contributing to a yearly total of 22.74 million new tokens added in 2025.

items.title: India Approves Coinbase's Minority Stake Acquisition in CoinDCX
items.summary: The Competition Commission of India has approved Coinbase's acquisition of a minority stake in CoinDCX's parent company at a $2.4 billion valuation, as confirmed by Coinbase's Chief Legal Officer.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: TCS Quantifies AI Business Growth with 16.3% Quarter-on-Quarter Surge
items.summary: TCS CEO K Krithivasan revealed the company has executed nearly 5,500 AI engagements, with AI revenue growing over 16.3% quarter-on-quarter, outpacing the rest of the business. TCS announced an AI upgrade to its TCS BaNCS banking platform featuring machine learning, generative AI, and pre-built agents.

items.title: QConAI NY 2025: NVIDIA Platform Focuses on Reliable Agentic AI Design
items.summary: At QConAI NY 2025, Aaron Erickson from NVIDIA emphasized designing AI platforms for reliability by combining probabilistic agentic components with deterministic boundaries, addressing challenges like tool selection and the paradox of choice in LLMs.

items.title: Christopher Penn Predicts 2026 AI Trends: Hybrid Models and Autonomous Agents
items.summary: In a December 21 YouTube episode, AI expert Christopher Penn outlines 2026 trends based on academic research, including shifts from dense models, Google's multi-tasking AI advancements, and breakthroughs in hybrid models and autonomous agents.

items.title: AI Transforms Understanding of Complex Systems, Published December 21
items.summary: A new article highlights how AI, surpassing earlier machine learning methods, is revolutionizing the analysis and comprehension of complex systems across various fields.

items.title: Workplace Skill Shift: Prompting AI Now More Critical Than Usage
items.summary: An El Pais article on December 21 stresses that the ability to provide concise instructions to AI is becoming a key differentiator for employees in modern workplaces.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Wuthering Waves Version 3.0 'We Who See The Stars' Launches December 25
items.summary: Kuro Games announced the major Version 3.0 update for Wuthering Waves, titled 'We Who See The Stars,' launching on PC, PS5, iOS, and Android on December 25. The game also received awards from The Game Awards 2025 Players’ Voice, PlayStation Partner and Users’ Choice Awards, Google Play Best Ongoing, and Hollywood Music In Media Awards, with x1600 Astrite gifted to players.[1]

items.title: Baldur's Gate 3 Sells 20 Million Copies
items.summary: Baldur's Gate 3 has surpassed 20 million copies sold, adding 5 million units this year alone. The milestone highlights the game's ongoing success in the RPG space.[2]

items.title: EA Permanently Removes Real Racing 3 After 12 Years
items.summary: EA announced the delisting of Real Racing 3 from app stores on December 18, 2025, with servers shutting down on March 19, 2026, due to an emotional decision likely tied to licenses and costs. In-app purchases are disabled, but remaining currencies can be used until shutdown.[5]

items.title: Epic Games Store Free Game: Blood West (December 20)
items.summary: Epic Games Store revealed Blood West as its free game giveaway for December 20, continuing the holiday promotion series.[4]

items.title: James Ohlen Joins Wizards of the Coast for TTRPG Role
items.summary: Former BioWare developer James Ohlen has left Archetype Entertainment to become Creative Consultant for Tabletop RPGs at Wizards of the Coast.[2]

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Nvidia Rumored to Cut GPU Supply by 30-40% in Early 2026
items.summary: Nvidia is reportedly planning to reduce GPU supply by 30-40% in early 2026 amid ongoing market challenges in PC gaming and hardware shortages. This comes alongside a described 'worst year for PC gaming' with RAM crises and scams affecting the industry.

items.title: AMD Confirms Next-Gen Zen 6 CPU Details and 9850X3D Appears at Retailers
items.summary: AMD has officially confirmed details on its next-generation Zen 6 CPUs, while the 9850X3D processor has shown up at retailers with early pricing. Calls are growing for AMD to revive the popular 5800X3D amid demand.

items.title: Mini-ITX Motherboard Launches with Four Full-Sized RAM Slots Amid Shortage
items.summary: A new Mini-ITX motherboard has launched featuring four full-sized RAM slots, supporting up to 256GB of DDR5, despite ongoing RAM shortages and scams in the market.

items.title: Major Tech Layoffs Continue: TCS, Google, Amazon, Microsoft Cut Thousands
items.summary: Tech giants including TCS, Google (over 100 in Cloud), Microsoft (9,000 jobs), Amazon (up to 16,000), and others announced significant layoffs in 2025 to restructure and cut costs across operations.

items.title: US Lawmakers Demand Answers from Tech Giants on Data Center Electricity Costs
items.summary: Democratic senators sent a letter to Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Meta, and others questioning if their energy-intensive data centers are raising US household electricity bills, with consumption projected to triple by 2028.

items.title: New Tesla Model 3 Owner Shares Positive First EV Experience
items.summary: A new Tesla Model 3 owner reports being impressed after a month of use, with their father also switching to a Model S Plaid after a test drive, highlighting real-world EV adoption.
